channel.title: Nathanael Fillmore on Li Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Nathanael Fillmore on Li Lab

item.title: DETONATE (DE novo TranscriptOme rNa-seq Assembly with or without the Truth Evaluation)
item.description: A de novo transcriptome assembly evaluation package, which contains two components, RSEM-EVAL and REF-EVAL. Bo developed the RSEM-EVAL component. Publications: DETONATE paper
